name: Amiibo Tap: Nintendo's Greatest Bits
description:
Discover definitive moments of classic Nintendo games while exploring
the company's catalogue and legacy. Simply tap any amiibo™ figure to the
Wii U™ GamePad controller to unlock scenes from NES™ and Super NES™ Wii
U Virtual Console™ titles! You never know—the next game you try may
become one of your new all-time favorites!

Grab an amiibo from your collection and tap it to the GamePad to receive
a gift! Each gift contains select scenes from a random NES or Super NES
game included in this software's selection of titles. Don’t worry about
which amiibo to use—every amiibo unlocks bits to play! After un-wrapping
your gift, you can dive right into a three minute gameplay scene that
introduces you to that game. Then switch to another scene by tapping the
same amiibo to the GamePad again. Want more gifts? No problem! You can
receive another gift by tapping a different amiibo at any time!

Discover the joy and legacy of NES and Super NES on the Wii U Virtual
Console service

Dozens of games and scenes to discover

Each amiibo figure unlocks a random game to sample included in this
software's selection of titles

Each game contains multiple scenes that last for three minutes

Compatible with all amiibo figures

At least one amiibo accessory is required to use this software; sold
separately.
